QuestData.Title: A Fascinating Fungus
QuestData.Description: The Zangar Shore is home to many peculiar strains of fungi, some of which are similar to those of our native Azeroth. However, one strain in particular is most fascinating!$b$bI call it "Zangarium Draenormycota," due to its prevelance in Draenor's fungal ecosystem. This unique strain of fungus is highly adaptable and can be found on many of the living organisms throughout Zangar Shore.$b$bWhy does it exist? What properties does it hold?$b$bTo answer these questions, I will need additional spore samples.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the spore samples for my research?
QuestData.RewardText: You have the spore samples for my research! Excellent!$b$bThe Zangar Shore is a dangerous place... what with the risk of fungal mutation and all.$b$bOh... I didn't mention that part before? I was sure I did!$b$bNo matter! You look hardy enough, I'm sure your genes are impervious to foreign fungal strains that your body has never before encountered!
